subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni and Phil Jackson have crossed paths before. And this time, to everyone’s surprise, D’Antoni was the one who came out on top when he was named the Lakers’ coach.
snippet: Mike D’Antoni and Phil Jackson have crossed paths before. And this time, to everyone’s surprise, D’Antoni was the one who came out on top when he was named the Lakers’ coach.
